commits.author: Mark Holbrook
commits.summary: Added additional section snippets and made s1-3 consistent
commits.body:
Added snippets for sections 4-8 using:

  4. ^
  5. "
  6. +
  7. ~
  8. #

Modified info.plist to add them to the proper place in the menu.

commits.author: Michael Sheets
commits.summary: Display tooltip when used in the wrong context.
commits.body: Previously would return a standard error code resulting in an error dialog.

commits.author: Rob Allen
commits.summary: Allow 'Extend Title' to work without being at the end of a file.
commits.body: Currently it only works if the section is the last line in the file. It is more useful if it could be used for any title created anywhere in the file.

commits.author: Adam Vandenberg
commits.summary: Add link to reST on docutils site

commits.author: Adam Vandenberg
commits.summary: Parens are OK in link defs

commits.author: Adam Vandenberg
commits.summary: Rename inline to all so it sorts to the top of the repo

commits.author: Adam Vandenberg
commits.body: Tweak raw inline end to be closer to spec and allow ` within a raw block

commits.author: Adam Vandenberg
commits.summary: End raw blocks with a look-ahead

commits.author: Adam Vandenberg
commits.summary: Multiline interpreted text needs to have a role (not per spec, but makes grammar reasonable.)

commits.author: Adam Vandenberg
commits.summary: Move up interpreted text rule to place nicer w/ links

commits.author: Adam Vandenberg
commits.summary: Per spec, raw inlines recognized before link references

commits.author: Adam Vandenberg
commits.summary: Tweak link ref to not break  raw inlines.

commits.author: Adam Vandenberg
commits.summary: backtick link references can span lines

commits.author: Adam Vandenberg
commits.summary: Link targets can also be back-quoted; broaden char classes

commits.author: Adam Vandenberg
commits.summary: Fix legal link reference characters per reST spec.

commits.author: Adam Vandenberg
commits.summary: Dashes are allowed in links and references

commits.author: Adam Vandenberg
commits.summary: This is more properly a capturename

commits.author: Adam Vandenberg
commits.body:
* Fix definition. Comments begin with dot-dot-space.
   Three dots is not a comment.

 * Also remove redundant grammar comments.

Conflicts:
	Syntaxes/reStructuredText.plist

commits.author: Adam Vandenberg
commits.summary: Fix directive names; dash must come first in chargroup.

commits.author: Adam Vandenberg
commits.summary: Tag directive args as an entity (wip)

commits.author: Adam Vandenberg
commits.summary: Add support for directives w/ args

commits.author: Lionel Panhaleux
commits.body:
1) Raw block limits:
    This is a raw block::

        Here it is

    and it stops here, even if this line is indented.

#. This is a raw block too::

      Here it is

   and it stops here

2) This is not a comment:
.. program:: my_program

3) This is a ref, even with `-` and `_` chars:
.. _my-complex_ref::

commits.author: Lionel Panhaleux
commits.body:
Line beginning with three points is not a comment block. Only a blank
line ends the comment block

commits.author: Lionel Panhaleux
commits.body:
Sone dashes and punctuation in the link name (before '<') are
authorized.
